Im 12 and I really just want to be famous. But I fail. Yah. I fail. Life indeed is hard. Im living in a country where every 8 secs an explosion occures. I just wang to be a lil famous. I posted a video of me rapping. People commented on my video saying things like "OMG YOUR A TERRORIST! " "FAG YOU MUSLIM. MUSLIM MEANS TERRORIST AND BARBARISM" no guys please it just makes me really really sad people telling me that kind of things. Terrorism has no religion.  Life here is so hard. I wish I will go to japan in feature.  I talked with a Japanese man and told him im a Muslim and want to come there. He said "YOU ARE GOING TO TERRORIZE OUR PEOPLE YOU MUSLIM JIHADIST! FUCK YOU!" Well it made me really sad. Please guys. Don't call me bad things. I love you all people.
